# Ecommerce Platform Features

## Product Management Features

### Product Catalog Display
- Display products in grid and list views
- Pagination for large product lists
- Sorting by price, name, popularity
- Filtering by category, price range, brand
- Product image gallery with zoom
- Product variants (size, color, etc.)

### Product Search
- Full-text search across product names and descriptions
- Search suggestions/autocomplete
- Search filters and facets
- Search result ranking
- Search history

### Product Reviews
- Customer review submission
- Rating system (1-5 stars)
- Review moderation
- Review helpfulness voting
- Review sorting and filtering

## Shopping Cart Features

### Cart Functionality
- Add products to cart
- Update item quantities
- Remove items from cart
- Save cart for later
- Cart expiration handling
- Cart sharing via link

### Cart Calculations
- Subtotal calculation
- Tax calculation based on location
- Shipping cost calculation
- Discount/coupon application
- Total price display

## Checkout Features

### Checkout Process
- Multi-step checkout (cart → shipping → payment → review)
- Guest checkout option
- Shipping address validation
- Multiple shipping options
- Payment method selection
- Order review before submission

### Payment Processing
- Credit card payment (Stripe)
- PayPal integration
- Apple Pay / Google Pay
- Payment method saving
- Payment security (PCI compliance)

## User Account Features

### Authentication
- User registration with email verification
- Login with email/password
- Social login (Google, Facebook)
- Password reset functionality
- Two-factor authentication (2FA)
- Session management

### User Profile
- Profile information editing
- Password change
- Email change with verification
- Account deletion
- Privacy settings

### Order Management
- Order history view
- Order details and tracking
- Order cancellation (if allowed)
- Return/refund requests
- Invoice download

### Address Management
- Multiple shipping addresses
- Address validation
- Default address selection
- Address editing and deletion

### Wishlist
- Add products to wishlist
- Remove from wishlist
- Share wishlist
- Move wishlist items to cart

## Admin Dashboard Features

### Product Management
- Create/edit/delete products
- Bulk product operations
- Product image upload
- Inventory management
- Product categorization
- Product import/export

### Order Management
- View all orders
- Order status updates
- Order fulfillment tracking
- Refund processing
- Order analytics

### User Management
- View user list
- User details and activity
- User role management
- User account suspension
- User search and filtering

### Analytics and Reporting
- Sales reports
- Product performance metrics
- User activity analytics
- Revenue tracking
- Export reports (CSV, PDF)

### Discount Management
- Create discount codes
- Set discount rules
- Discount usage tracking
- Bulk discount creation
- Discount expiration

## Technical Features

### Performance Optimization
- Image lazy loading
- Code splitting
- API response caching
- Database query optimization
- CDN integration

### Security Features
- Rate limiting
- Input sanitization
- SQL injection prevention
- XSS protection
- CSRF protection
- Secure headers

### Search and Filtering
- Elasticsearch integration
- Advanced filtering options
- Faceted search
- Search analytics
- Search result caching

### Notifications
- Email notifications (order confirmations, shipping updates)
- In-app notifications
- SMS notifications (optional)
- Push notifications (mobile)

### Internationalization
- Multi-language support
- Currency conversion
- Regional pricing
- Localized content
